Rules
1. No outside communication about this game unless your role permits it.
2. Don't quote your Role PM or any out-of-thread communications. Don't fake-quote it, either. Paraphrasing is fine.
3. Do not edit/delete your posts.
4. To vote somebody, either bold your vote, such as vote: ChaosOmega, or use vote tags, such as VOTE: ChaosOmega. If your vote isn't bolded or vote tagged, it will not count. Unvotes are not necessary to change your vote.
5. During the day, a player will be lynched when they have more than 50% of the players currently alive voting for them. Once that amount has been reached, they're dead; no unvotes will save them. Players can post in the thread up until I post the lynch scene and the thread is locked.
6. Once it has been posted by me that you are dead, you're dead. Do not post any more, not even a bah post.
7. Every day will have a deadline of 2 weeks. Extensions will be given for extreme circumstances.
8. Nights will have a deadline of 2 days. If you have a night action and do not send one, you will do nothing.
9. If you're going to be gone for longer than a 48-hour period, post in-thread letting everyone know for how long. If 48 hours pass without a player posting or saying they will be absent, I will prod them. For the purposes of this rule, the weekend counts as 24 hours.
10. If a player would receive a fourth prod (unless it is their first prod of the day) or they have not responded to a prod within 24 hours, I will search for a replacement for them.
11. #0040FF is my color. Don't use it. Also, no small or invisible text or cryptography.
12. Please PM me if you have any questions about the game.
13. Have fun.
14. If anyone breaks any of the aforementioned rules, I have complete control over the actions that will be taken.

Sample Townie Role PM
You are a Townie. Your only weapons are your mind and your vote. Use them wisely.

You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and at least one member of the town is still alive.

Please confirm by sending your role to me via PM.
Role PMs are going out very soon. When I receive 11/13 confirmations, Day 1 will begin.

It is now Day 1. With 13 alive, it takes 7 to lynch.

The deadline for Day 1 is exactly 2 weeks from this post, or in (expired on 2016-03-03 17:09:09).

In post 52, KainTepes wrote:L-1 is one vote before LYNCHING??

Yup.

Here, we do not turbo lynch very often. Once you are L-1 that is when your 'defensive' phase starts. It really is not an official phase here as once another vote is in that ends the day and starts twilight but most players will give you the chance to present your case at that time. When there are players that do not it is generally known and then town will only run people up to L-2 before asking for claims.

In post 77, Soapbar wrote:NO.

IF YOU WISH TO SURVIVE YOU MUST. LYNCH. EVERYONE


So do I tell everyone my Role when I am in the turbo lynch??

When you are L-1 as has already been pointed out. That does not mean you are 'in turbo lynch.' That is just a phrase I used to mean that someone comes in and lynches you before you get the chance to defend yourself. Honestly I really should not have used that exact phrase as "quick hammer" is more accurate. How this usually works here is people will present a case on a player that they think is scum and convince others to join the "wagon" (vote that player). Once that player reaches "L-1" (requires one more player to be lynched) they will normally claim or someone will ask for a "claim" (reveal their role and any information that they might have garnered from it). Before casting the last vote that will lynch a player the person casting it will "announce intent to hammer within XX hours" (meaning they will cast the last vote that results in a lynch - normally 24 hours from intent). Then that player will have one last chance to defend themselves. Once the time is up the final vote is cast and the player is lynched. This is a typical course of events here however, as already stated, it is not a hard set of rules and sometimes someone will quick hammer and end the day prematurely. That is not all that common though because it is normally punished here by lynching the quick hammer vote the next day. It is anti town to hammer before the rest of town is ready for it.

@MOD With all this voting can we get a quick VC.

Town 1-shot Vigilante wrote:You are a Town 1-shot Vigilante.

As a Town 1-shot Vigilante, you may target a player at night. If successful, you will shoot that player, killing them. This ability may only be used once during the game.

You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and at least one member of the town is still alive.

Please confirm by sending your role to me via PM.


Town 2-shot Cop wrote:You are a Town 2-shot Cop.

As a Town 2-shot Cop, you may target a player at night to investigate them. If successful, you will receive a result of "*playername* is innocent." if the player is aligned with the town or is investigation-immune, or "*playername* is guilty." otherwise. This ability may only be used twice during the game.

You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and at least one member of the town is still alive.

Please confirm by sending your role to me via PM.
